Articles.Content:
Okay, so I came across this game via a friend of mine, and suffice it to say I was very interested in it.

Now, I\'ve Pre-Ordered/Donated on the main site, but when I try to download the program, I get a zip folder that won\'t unzip.

Am I doing something wrong?

A quick answer would be much appreciated.

EDIT: For some reason the normal, on-site download link isn\'t working, and then I saw the mirror download link, that actually downloaded the program properly.

What computer are you using?

Try redownloading

Open with a different program than usual?

Welcome to the KSP Forums, may your stay be long and awesome.

-Arcane

Also before a certain someone comes in I felt like doing his work for him

Happy Launchings!

Capt. Skunky
